column1: Local Foods////I can't remember everything we had but a few things to note. The sandwiches
column3: are a bit messy to eat. Needed lots of napkins for sure. I had the duck confit and hubby had the crunchy chicken. I think I preferred the crunchy chicken. The sides were okay
column4: very healthy. Hubs got a soup
column5: again he got the better pick haha. Kind of wish I tried the truffled egg salad but who knows
column6: maybe next time we're in Houston! :)
